Frosty Freeze
Big Timber Montana Listing Type: Fast Food Restaurant City: Big Timber Montana Region: Yellowstone Country 406-932-5799
The Frosty Freez is the friendliest place in town!! We offer breakfast, lunch&dinner for take out or dining in. We have a large menu featuring 100% Montana Beef burgers,&pressure fried chicken. Soft serve ice cream for your pleasure. Hope to see you soon!
Directions: The Frosty Freez is located on the east end of town right on the business loop. Either exit will get you easy off access to Big Timber.
Frosty Freeze 403 East Boulder, Big Timber, MT 59011
Activities Dining
Services Air Conditioning Breakfast Dinner Lunch Restaurant Take-Out Public Restroom Parking Non-smoking
